title: Honey and orange roast duck
ingredients: ['1 (2kg) whole duck, rinsed', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh basil leaves', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh root ginger', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 orange, quartered', '475ml water', '350g honey', '110g butter', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '125ml freshly squeezed orange juice']
